com.movin.scanner

Class MovinScanResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movin.scanner.MovinScanResult

  • public class MovinScanResult
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovinScanResult(BeaconIdentifier beaconIdentifier, int rssi, byte txPower, double distance, long timestamp)
      Creates a new MovinScanResult, only accessible in this package.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatteryLevel()
      Returns the battery level of this beacon.
      java.lang.String getBeaconCode()
      Returns the beacon code of th is beacon.
      BeaconIdentifier getBeaconIdentifier()
      Returns the BeaconIdentifier of the beacon that sent this scan.
      double getDistance()
      Returns the estimated distance towards this beacon in meters, calculated based on the rssi and txPower.
      java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()
      Returns the firmware version of this beacon.
      java.lang.String getManufacturer()
      Returns the manufacturer of this beacon.
      BeaconProximity getProximity()
      Returns the proximity to this beacon, can be one of the following: IMMEDIATE, NEAR, FAR or UNKNOWN.
      int getRssi()
      Returns the rssi value with which the beacon was measured.
      int getScanResultCount()
      Returns the amount of scan results that were averaged in this single MovinScanResult
      long getTimestamp()
      Returns the timestamp of when this event occurred in milliseconds.
      byte getTxPower()
      Returns the TxPower property of the beacon, which is the expected rssi value at 1m distance.
      boolean hasManufacturerData()
      Returns whether or not this scan result has manufacturer data included, which is retrieved when a scanResponse is received.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovinScanResult

        public MovinScanResult(BeaconIdentifier beaconIdentifier,
                       int rssi,
                       byte txPower,
                       double distance,
                       long timestamp)
        Creates a new MovinScanResult, only accessible in this package.
        Parameters:
        beaconIdentifier - The BeaconIdentifier of the beacon that caused this scan
        rssi - The received signal strength of the scan
        txPower - The txPower property of the iBeacon
        distance - The distance to this beacon, based on the rssi and txPower
        timestamp - The timestamp of when this scan occurred

      • hasManufacturerData

        public boolean hasManufacturerData()
        Returns whether or not this scan result has manufacturer data included, which is retrieved when a scanResponse is received.
        Returns:
        whether or not this scan result has manufacturer data included, which is retrieved when a scanResponse is received.

      • getManufacturer

        public java.lang.String getManufacturer()
        Returns the manufacturer of this beacon. Only useful if the beacon has received manufacturerData. Currently the only known beacon manufacturer is kontakt.
        Returns:
        the manufacturer of this beacon. Only useful if the beacon has received manufacturerData. Currently the only known beacon manufacturer is kontakt.

      • getBeaconCode

        public java.lang.String getBeaconCode()
        Returns the beacon code of th is beacon. Only useful if the beacon is manufactured by kontakt and it has received manufacturerData.
        Returns:
        the beacon code of th is beacon. Only useful if the beacon is manufactured by kontakt and it has received manufacturerData.

      • getFirmwareVersion

        public java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()

        Returns:

        public int getBatteryLevel()
        Returns the battery level of this beacon. Only useful if the beacon is manufactured by kontakt and it has received manufacturerData.

        public BeaconProximity getProximity()
